channel.title: CVE Feed for pxlrbt -- filament-excel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pxlrbt -- filament-excel

item.title: CVE-2024-42485|2024-08-12T15:39:41.174Z -- pxlrbt -- filament-excel
item.description: Filament Excel enables excel export for Filament admin resources. The export download route `/filament-excel/{path}` allowed downloading any file without login when the webserver allows `../` in the URL. Patched with Version v2.3.3.
